<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements the ResourcePriorityQueue class, which is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SchedulingPriorityQueue that prioritizes instructions using DFA state to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduce the length of the critical path through the basic block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on VLIW platforms.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The scheduler is basically a top-down adaptable list scheduler with DFA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resource tracking added to the cost function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DFA is queried as a state machine to model &quot;packets/bundles&quot; during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// schedule. Currently packets/bundles are discarded at the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scheduling, affecting only order of instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The isScheduleHigh flag allows nodes with wraparound dependencies that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot easily be modeled as edges with latencies to be scheduled as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// soon as possible in a top-down schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS-&gt;isScheduleHigh &amp;&amp; !RHS-&gt;isScheduleHigh)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LHS-&gt;isScheduleHigh &amp;&amp; RHS-&gt;isScheduleHigh)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHSNum = LHS-&gt;NodeNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RHSNum = RHS-&gt;NodeNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The most important heuristic is scheduling the critical path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHSLatency = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/resource-sort/#ab06712680bebdfe0b21e275cf7c0a377">PQ</a>-&gt;getLatency(LHSNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RHSLatency = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/resource-sort/#ab06712680bebdfe0b21e275cf7c0a377">PQ</a>-&gt;getLatency(RHSNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHSLatency &lt; RHSLatency) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHSLatency &gt; RHSLatency) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After that, if two nodes have identical latencies, look to see if one will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unblock more other nodes than the other.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHSBlocked = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/resource-sort/#ab06712680bebdfe0b21e275cf7c0a377">PQ</a>-&gt;getNumSolelyBlockNodes(LHSNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RHSBlocked = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/resource-sort/#ab06712680bebdfe0b21e275cf7c0a377">PQ</a>-&gt;getNumSolelyBlockNodes(RHSNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHSBlocked &lt; RHSBlocked) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHSBlocked &gt; RHSBlocked) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, just to provide a stable ordering, use the node number as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deciding factor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHSNum &lt; RHSNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;OnlyAvailablePred = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;Pred : SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#ae2b43854b542de66eec6475adc48f56c">Preds</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &amp;PredSU = &#42;Pred.getSUnit();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PredSU.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a8c201d7a769bda1cd75d8d6788123068">isScheduled</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found an available, but not scheduled, predecessor.  If it&#39;s the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcepriorityqueue/#a068e19beaca7ce41347bb87946fbe2c9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcepriorityqueue/#a068e19beaca7ce41347bb87946fbe2c9">ResourcePriorityQueue::push</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this SU does not fit in the packet</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResourcesModel-&gt;clearResources();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adaptable scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A small, but very parallel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// region, where reg pressure is an issue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HorizontalVerticalBalance &gt; <a href="#a0df822aea97e1eeadc0845521726bc19">RegPressureThreshold</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Critical path first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResCount += (SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a582da862b28b876ef2235781392cffa6">getHeight</a>() &#42; <a href="#ac23161046eaf1ee7b7a3d363291ec7bb">ScaleTwo</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If resources are available for it, multiply the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chance of scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcepriorityqueue/#afba9f58251019a23a1d7f60d6c958071">isResourceAvailable</a>(SU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResCount &lt;&lt;= <a href="#a05e54c70e7a069ff7a57d93bda6a529b">FactorOne</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider change to reg pressure from scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this SU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResCount -= (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcepriorityqueue/#a810f1b98c4887804780355393149e783">regPressureDelta</a>(SU,</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#42; <a href="#a2c30998d0887fcc4f3134287c8e5fd7f">ScaleOne</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default heuristic, greeady and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// critical path driven.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Critical path first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResCount += (SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a582da862b28b876ef2235781392cffa6">getHeight</a>() &#42; <a href="#ac23161046eaf1ee7b7a3d363291ec7bb">ScaleTwo</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now see how many instructions is blocked by this SU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResCount += (NumNodesSolelyBlocking&#91;SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a>&#93; &#42; <a href="#ac23161046eaf1ee7b7a3d363291ec7bb">ScaleTwo</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If resources are available for it, multiply the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chance of scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcepriorityqueue/#afba9f58251019a23a1d7f60d6c958071">isResourceAvailable</a>(SU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResCount &lt;&lt;= <a href="#a05e54c70e7a069ff7a57d93bda6a529b">FactorOne</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust number of parallel live ranges.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// adjustPriorityOfUnscheduledPreds - One of the predecessors of SU was just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// scheduled.  If SU is not itself available, then there is at least one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// predecessor node that has not been scheduled yet.  If SU has exactly ONE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unscheduled predecessor, we want to increase its priority: it getting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// scheduled will make this node available, so it is better than some other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// node of the same priority that will not make a node available.</span></CodeLine>
